title: Typeface identification – Avant Garde customised?
content:
Hello,

I've seen this typeface from time to time now, and it's very close to Avant Garde, but it isn't – especially the 's" looks well balanced – any help appreciated (what it is and where to find).

Thanks,  
Nikolaus
author: NPS

comments.content:
“design” is Neuzeit S Book Heavy

[http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neuzeit-grotesk/familytree.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623002618/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neuzeit-grotesk/familytree.html "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/linotype/neuzeit-grotesk/familytree.html")

“Made in Berlin” is something else (see the square i-dots).

Thank you for the quick reply!  
I attached another image – do you think it is a custom font?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623002618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ge_4531.jpg)
“Made in Berlin” is [House Chalet New York 1960](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623002618/http:/www.houseind.com/index.php?page=showfont&id=4&subpage=viewfonts) from House Industries.

Thanks a lot!!!  
Do you have any recommendation on this one as well?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623002618im_/http:/typophile.com/files/mcare_5137.png)

No. I dunno right now. Is this a logo?

Could you please post further request in separate topics.  
Otherwise the tracking of requests becomes difficult.

Yes, this is a logo – sorry for mixing up the content, will post the topics seperately.  
Thanks for your help!

I guess it’s custom designed.

[FF Super Grotesk](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623002618/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/fontfont/ff-supergrotesk/) goes in that direction.
[Mothercare](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623002618/http:/www.daltonmaag.com/about/modification/case_studies/mothercare.html) font by Dalton Maag (although not sure if they did the logo itself).

Oh yeah. I should have thought of [BT’s Geometric 706](http://web.archive.org/web/20120623002618/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/geometric-706/) which is based on Neuzeit Grotesk. It’s the basis for the Mothercare font.
